SEARCH
Module com.os.cpu_scheduler
Package com.os.cpu_scheduler.schedulers

Class Scheduler

java.lang.Object
com.os.cpu_scheduler.schedulers.Scheduler
Direct Known Subclasses:
FCFS, Priority, RoundRobin, SJF
public abstract class Scheduler extends Object
Scheduler Class is an abstract class responsible for executing scheduler algorithms implemented by subclasses.
